title: Oil Pump, Replace (Z20 LET)

steps.text: Remove engine undertray
Remove exhaust undertray
Lower vehicle
Disconnect battery negative lead

substeps.text: Release windscreen wash reservoir, then move to one side

steps.text: Disconnect intercooler hose (1) from connecting pipe for throttle body
Disconnect oxygen sensor harness from engine harness
Remove oil level dipstick
Raise vehicle
Drain engine oil

substeps.text: Remove drain bolt from lower oil pan

steps.text: Remove oil filter, then discard
Disconnect engine harness from oil pressure switch
Release 2x oil line from thermostat housing for oil cooler

substeps.text: Remove banjo bolt from feed line (1)
Remove banjo bolt from return line (2)

steps.text: Lower vehicle to suitable working height
Remove rear road wheel from right side

substeps.text: Use special socket located under front bonnet

steps.text: Remove wheel arch liner, right rear
Remove intercooler hose (1) from intercooler
Remove upper front cover (2) for timing belt
Remove ribbed V-belt

substeps.text: Using suitable spanner rotate tensioner (1) clockwise, then

Using suitable spanner rotate tensioner (1) clockwise, then
Install suitable locking pin (2)

steps.text: Remove crankshaft pulley

substeps.text: Apply match marks to crankshaft pulley and crankshaft
Counter-hold centre bolt on crankshaft sprocket

steps.text: Remove ribbed V-belt tensioner
Remove lower cover for timing belt
Rotate crankshaft in normal direction of rotation to Top Dead Centre (TDC) on cylinder no. 1, until timing marks (2) and (1) are aligned
Lock camshafts in position
Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Release harness for oxygen sensor from subframe
Release harness for oxygen sensor from heatshield
Remove secondary catalytic converter (1) for exhaust

substeps.text: Release rubber mount bracket from flange bolt
Remove gasket (4) from front joint, then discard

steps.text: Install engine support to engine assembly
Remove heatshield from rear engine mount

substeps.text: Remove 2x bolt from rear engine mount
Remove bolt from engine cylinder block

steps.text: Loose install 2x bolt to rear engine mount Note: To ensure engine safely secured
Remove engine support from engine assembly
Remove turbocharger oil feed pipe from engine cylinder block and turbocharger
Install drain bolt (1) 10 Nm
Remove lower oil pan from upper oil pan Note: Support lower oil pan when removing to avoid damage to harness for oil level sensor.

substeps.text: Remove, then discard oil pan gasket

steps.text: Disconnect engine harness from oil level sensor
Remove upper oil pan from engine cylinder block
Remove oil pick-up pipe from oil pump and balancer shafts
Lower vehicle to suitable working height
Release tension from timing belt

substeps.text: Release bolt, then turn adjusting eccentric clockwise in

steps.text: Remove timing belt from pulleys

substeps.text: Position timing belt to one side

steps.text: Remove crankshaft sprocket (1) from crankshaft
Remove woodruff key and spacer from crankshaft
Remove tensioner for timing belt (1)
Remove 2x guide roller for timing belt (1)
Lower vehicle
Disconnect harness connector (1) from ignition module
Remove ignition module cover (2) from cylinder head
Remove ignition module from cylinder head
Disconnect harness connector from camshaft sensor (1)
Release wiring harness from cylinder head cover
Disconnect 3x breather hose (2) from cylinder head cover (3)
Remove cylinder head cover
Remove 2x camshaft pulley (2) and (3) from camshaft Note: Note position of locating pin on pulley for exhaust camshaft.

substeps.text:
Counter-hold camshaft at hexagon with open end of spanner
(4)

steps.text: Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Install and set Engine Support Tool KM-6054 (1), use with Adapter KM-904 (2)
Remove engine mounting bracket from support bracket on engine cylinder block and damping block
Remove timing belt from vehicle
Remove support bracket from engine cylinder block
Remove rear cover of camshaft timing belt (1) from engine cylinder block
Remove thermostat housing for oil cooler (1) from oil pump
Remove oil pump (1) from engine cylinder block
Install new oil pump to engine cylinder block
Install new oil seal to oil pump

substeps.text: Lubricate sealing lip of oil seal
Use KM-693-A (1) with bolt and washer

steps.text: Install thermostat housing for oil cooler to oil pump
Install rear cover of camshaft timing belt to engine cylinder block
Install support bracket to engine cylinder block
Install timing belt to vehicle Note: Note rotational direction of timing belt.
Install engine mounting bracket to support bracket on engine cylinder block and damping block
Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Remove Engine Support Tool KM-6054 and Adapter KM-904 from engine
Lower vehicle to suitable working height
Install 2x camshaft pulley to 2x camshaft Note: Note position of locating pin on pulley for exhaust camshaft.

substeps.text: Counter-hold camshaft at hexagon with open end of spanner

steps.text: Install cylinder head cover to cylinder head

substeps.text: Install 10 x new 'O' ring, new gasket

steps.text: Connect 3x breather hose to cylinder head cover
Secure wiring harness to cylinder head cover
Connect harness connector to camshaft sensor
Install ignition module to cylinder head
Install ignition module cover to cylinder head
Connect harness connector to ignition module
Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Install 2x guide roller for timing belt
Install tensioner for timing belt
Install woodruff key and spacer to crankshaft
Install crankshaft sprocket to crankshaft
Check timing marks are aligned
Lock camshafts in position
Install timing belt to pulleys
Pre-tension timing belt

substeps.text: Turn eccentric of tensioner in direction of arrow
Rotate crankshaft two complete turns in normal direction of

steps.text: Tension timing belt

substeps.text: Release tensioner bolt, then turn eccentric of tensioner in

steps.text: Secure tensioner

Rotate crankshaft two complete turns in normal direction of rotation to (TDC) on cylinder no. 1, until timing marks are aligned. If pointer of tensioner does not align with corresponding notch mark, then repeat adjustment procedure
Install lower cover of camshaft timing belt
Install ribbed V-belt tensioner
Install crankshaft pulley

substeps.text: Counter-hold centre nut on crankshaft sprocket

steps.text: Install ribbed V-belt

substeps.text: Use suitable spanner to rotate tensioner clockwise, then remove

steps.text: Install upper cover of camshaft timing belt
Install intercooler hose to intercooler
Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Install oil pick-up pipe to oil pump and balancer shafts
Install upper oil pan to engine cylinder block

substeps.text: Apply a bead of adhesive compound to casing joints

steps.text: Connect engine harness to oil level sensor
Install lower oil pan to upper oil pan Note: Support lower oil pan when installing to avoid damage to harness for oil level sensor.
Install turbocharger oil feed pipe to engine cylinder block and turbocharger
Connect engine harness to oil pressure switch
Secure 2x oil line to thermostat housing for oil cooler

substeps.text: Install banjo bolt, feed pipe to thermostat housing for oil
Install banjo bolt, return pipe to thermostat housing for oil

steps.text: Install new oil filter
Install engine support to engine assembly
Remove 2x bolt from rear engine mount
Install heatshield to rear engine mount and engine cylinder block

substeps.text: Install 2x bolt to rear engine mount 49
Install bolt to engine cylinder block

steps.text: Remove engine support from engine assembly
Install secondary catalytic converter for exhaust

substeps.text: Secure rubber mount bracket to flange bolt
Install new gasket to front joint

steps.text: Secure harness for oxygen sensor to subframe
Secure harness for oxygen sensor to heatshield
Lower vehicle to suitable working height
Install liner to wheel arch
Install rear road wheel to right side
Lower vehicle
Secure rear road wheel
Install oil level dipstick
Install intercooler hose to throttle body
Connect oxygen sensor harness to engine harness
Reconnect battery negative lead
Install windscreen wash reservoir
Fill engine to correct oil level

substeps.text: Start and run engine until oil light goes out

steps.text: Program all volatile memories
Raise vehicle
Install engine undertray
Install exhaust undertray
Lower vehicle

Tighten 15 Nm – Lubricate O ring seal
Install 2x bolt to rear engine mount 49 Nm
Tighten 4x bolt, security bolt 90 Nm

warnings:
A four-post hoist must
be used to raise the vehicle when removing the engine undertray.
The vehicle can be moved to a two-post hoist for other operations
if required.

Observe relevant
environmental requirements when disposing of used engine oil.
